trans-unit.source: Represents an attribute that is applied to the class definition and determines the <xref href="System.Windows.Style.TargetType"></xref>s of the properties that are of type <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>.
Control authors apply this attribute to the class definition to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>s of the properties that are of type <xref:System.Windows.Style>.

For example, if you look at the declaration of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> class, this attribute is used to specify that the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
Subclasses inherit this definition but can redefine the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of the property by using this attribute on its own class definition.
You cannot use this class or its properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.StyleTypedPropertyAttribute"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the name of the property that is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>.
You cannot use this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
The name of the property that is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style.TargetType"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.StyleTypedPropertyAttribute.Property"></xref> this attribute is specifying.
You cannot use this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
The <xref href="System.Windows.Style.TargetType"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.StyleTypedPropertyAttribute.Property"></xref> this attribute is specifying.
